name: My Dream Chapter - 1
description: This game is a creative game that will show and tell you different view. This is one of my dream that i wrote in a book. You need to be patient while playing. This game contains 2 scene. First one is my room and second one is my dream. Gameplay length is 20 minutes. All things(except 2 model) are my drawings. All codes were written by me. Language is English only for now.
